title: Why are the VODs not being updated?
body: the vods have stopped being updated since the match between TIP and gravity game 3. Game 4 of TIP and gravity was never uploaded, and the challenger series finals and bronze match never went up either.

replies.body: I meant on the vods page of the website. http://na.lolesports.com/vods/ it is unbecoming of riot to not update these
All of them are updated. Keep in mind it has been mentioned by Riot that they will provide the vods as soon as possible but it can take a day or two.

no, they aren't. the last one updated is TIP vs gravity game 3. The other games were up less than an hour after they finished, it does not take days or weeks to upload. They also never uploaded the challenger series finals, but they have uploaded the quarterfinals. Before you just immidiately say something like that, you should actually check the page at least >.>
as someone who likes to play hearthstone and watch LCS, I also find this really annoying. I wish they would update their page.

[Here you are sir](https://www.youtube.com/user/LoLChampSeries/videos)

EDIT cause they isolated TiP Games to a playlist

[Playoffs for TiP/GV or TL/CLG](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dRC8Vw1r94c&list=PLPZ7h6L6LC7XEdBPAvA4u7Yv5U-UCnQxu)
